lines.text: create characters a , b , c , d
read a read b read c read d
print maximum of absolute value of a - c and absolute value of b - d , print newline
lines.code: cout << max ( abs ( a - c ) , abs ( b - d ) ) << endl ;

lines.text: while a is not c or b is not d
if a is less than c , print ' R ' , increment a
lines.code: if ( a < c ) cout << ' R ' , a ++ ;

lines.text: if a is greater than c , print ' L ' , decrement a
lines.code: if ( a > c ) cout << ' L ' , a -- ;

lines.text: if b is greater than d , print ' D ' , decrement b
lines.code: if ( b > d ) cout << ' D ' , b -- ;

lines.text: if b is less than d , print ' U ' , increment b
lines.code: if ( b < d ) cout << ' U ' , b ++ ;
